title: Putting league Fullscreen in second monitor?
body:
Hey, I usually play league on a laptop (with a separate connected mouse and keyboard), and i was thinking about hooking up a monitor to the laptop and playing league on the much bigger screen WITHOUT using the mirror option.

I would love to use the extend option and use the bigger screen (the monitor) to play league and do much smaller tasks on my smaller laptop screen.

I haven't tried this before and I am thinking that the laptop screen would take priority, but this is why I've come here and ask the boards and see if it's possible to fully transfer the full screen league to whichever monitor i choose.

replies.body: I do just exactly this, and it works totally fine for me.  All you have to do is select the second monitor as your primary in your Windows settings, and league will launch on your bigger screen.  No worries!
